image_analysis.product_type: neoprene/vinyl coated dumbbell set with stand
image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (1kg + 2kg + 3kg Set) 12kg Dumbbell With Stand
image_analysis.size: 1kg + 2kg + 3kg set; incremental weights available between 0.5kg to 10kg
image_analysis.quantity: 3 pairs of dumbbells with stand (set total 12kg)
key_features: Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and to prevent rolling
Interior is made of cast iron with a strong matte finish
Color coded thick vinyl/neoprene coating for comfortable and non-slip feel
Neoprene coating allows for easy grip and a non-slip texture
Dumbbell weight set range with incremental weights between 0.5kg to 10kg to vary workout intensity
Ideal for power walk, group exercises, bodybuilding, strengthening muscles, alleviating stress, physical therapy and other general exercises
image_analysis.usage: Used for strength training, aerobic workouts, group exercise, physical therapy, and general fitness routines at home or in the gym.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home and gym users, fitness enthusiasts, and beginners seeking compact, color-coded dumbbells for varied strength and aerobic workouts.
image_analysis.ai_description: Set of compact KAKSS dumbbells with a hex shape and smooth color coating, shown in bright tones like pink, teal, red, blue and green. Ends are clearly weight-marked in kilograms. A matching stand holds multiple pairs neatly for home or studio workouts.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hex-shaped KAKSS dumbbells stay put and rack neatly on the stand for safe, compact home storage.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheaper round dumbbells roll away, clutter floors and create trip hazards between sets.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Thick neoprene/vinyl coating gives a secure, non-slip grip even in sweaty, high-rep workouts.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost weights often have slick paint or thin coating that feels slippery and hard to hold.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Professional cast-iron core delivers solid, balanced weight that withstands daily home-gym use.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Budget sets can chip, crack or feel uneven, with coating peeling after a few weeks of training.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Colour-coded 1kg, 2kg, 3kg pairs (12kg total) match the wider KAKSS 0.5–10kg range for easy progression.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Many cheap sets lack clear markings or expansion options, making it hard to progress workouts.
